articles.title: Pete Buttigieg Responds to AOC Calling $2.2T Biden Infrastructure Plan 'Not Nearly Enough' - Newsweek

articles.content:
Today we set another all-time record for number of shots reported administered in a single day, coming in at almost 4 million -- 14% higher than our previous best of 3.5 million last Saturday.

articles.description: America edged closer to approaching a degree of normalcy on Saturday when the Biden administration announced the U.S. set a new record for the number of COVID-19 shots administered in one day, inoculating over 4 million people.
articles.title: US hits COVID-19 milestone as vaccinations top 4 million - Digital Journal

articles.title: Queen Noor, Mom of Detained Jordanian Prince, Blames 'Wicked Slander' for Son's Detention - The Daily Beast

articles.content: MANILA - A US navy destroyer sunk during World War II and lying nearly 6,500 meters below sea level off the Philippines has been reached in the world's deepest shipwreck dive, an American exploration… [+1692 chars]
articles.description: A US navy destroyer sunk during World War II and lying nearly 6,500 meters below sea level off the Philippines has been reached in the world's deepest shipwreck dive, an American exploration team said.
articles.title: 'Deepest wreck dive' reaches US WWII ship off Philippines - ABS-CBN News
